relproducts.title: Cottage Garden Poppy Red Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Be transported to the garden with this botanical print. Featuring staples of the english traditional garden, this roman blind is sure to bring joy to your home. Featuring a blend of colours, such as red and yellows intertwined with blues, greens and oranges, this multicoloured, multi-flowered pattern is as beautiful as it is detailed. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
